effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 10.2 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 923,880 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Greatcloak of the Turned Champion

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
